title: Oops!... I Did It Again (song)
summary: "Oops!... I Did It Again" is a song by American singer Britney Spears from her second studio album of the same name (2000). It was released on April 11, 2000, by Jive Records as the lead single from the album. It was written and produced by Max Martin and Rami Yacoub. Lyrically, the song refers to a female who views love as a game, and she decides to use that to her advantage by playing with her lover's emotions. Its bridge features a dialogue which references the 1997 film Titanic.
